name: In-house Escalation
query:
SELECT
    -- From HD Ticket
    hd.status AS "Status:Data:120",
    hd.custom_circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    hd.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    hd.custom_agent_name AS "Agent Name:Data:150",
    hd.custom_stage AS "Stage:Data:150",
    hd.priority AS "Priority:Data:100",
    hd.subject AS "Subject:Data:250",

    -- From In-house Escalation (custom_inhouse_eaclation)
    esc.task_type AS "Task Type:Data:150",
    esc.department AS "Department:Data:150",
    esc.task_subject AS "Task Subject:Data:250",
    esc.task_priority AS "Task Priority:Data:100",
    esc.task_id AS "Task ID:Data:150",
    esc.partner AS "Partner:Data:150",
    esc.support_mode AS "Support Mode:Data:150",
    esc.partner_ticket_number AS "Partner Ticket Number:Data:150",
    esc.task_status AS "Task Status:Data:120",
    esc.expected_start_date AS "Expected Start Date:Datetime:150",
    esc.expected_end_date AS "Expected End Date:Datetime:150",
    esc.completed_datetime AS "Completed Datetime:Datetime:150",
    esc.partner_ticket_log_date AS "Partner Ticket Log Date:Datetime:150"

FROM
    `tabHD Ticket` hd
INNER JOIN `tabIn-house Escalation` esc
    ON esc.parent = hd.name
   AND esc.parenttype = 'HD Ticket'
   AND esc.parentfield = 'custom_inhouse_eaclation'

WHERE
    hd.creation >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH)
    AND esc.task_type IS NOT NULL
    AND esc.task_type <> ''

ORDER BY
    hd.creation DESC;
